text:
RECORD OF MEETING OF
THE JOINT COMMITTEE ON EDUCATIONAL TELEVISION
WASHINGTON - DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA
September 29, 1954
Members Present;
David Henry, Chairman
American Council on Education
Edgar Fuller, Vice Chairman
(Executive Session only)
♦Gertrude Broderick
Council of Chief State School Officers
Association for Education by
Radio-Television
Graydon Ausmus
National Association of Educational
Broadcasters
Albert N. Jorgensen
National Association of State
Universities
♦♦Russell Thackrey
Association of Land-Grant Colleges
and Universities
Also Present;
Ralph Steetle
Executive Director, JCET
Blanche Crippen
Asst, Director-Publie Information, JCET
Walter Emery
Special Consultant, JCET
Cyril M. Braum

Business Representative, ACE
Telford Taylor
Counsel, JCET
Seymour Krieger
Counsel, JCET
Robert R. Mullen
Executive Director, NCCET
William Woods
(luncheon only)
Manager, Station WQED, Pittsburgh
Members Absent;
Belmont Farley
National Education Association
* Alternate for Franklin Dunham
♦* Alternate for James H. Denison
